markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fey Transcendence](/Feats.aspx?ID=4052) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="All Ancestries" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=467" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 128</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Fey Influence](/Feats.aspx?ID=1239)

</column>

---

You become a powerful fey creature, gaining strengths tied to the [First World](/Planes.aspx?ID=10) but also some of the weakness against which all fey must contend. You gain a +2 status bonus to saves against [illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), and [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61) effects, and you can use [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) on and to make very simple [Requests](/Actions.aspx?ID=51) of [animals](/Traits.aspx?ID=9) and [plants](/Traits.aspx?ID=125). You regain twice the number of Hit Points when resting in a natural wooded area, such as a forest or jungle. You have weakness to [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) equal to half your level.

**Special** This feat gains the trait appropriate for your ancestry ([human](/Traits.aspx?ID=90) for [human](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=6), [goblin](/Traits.aspx?ID=81) for [goblin](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=4), etc.).
name: Fey Transcendence

You regain twice the number of Hit Points when resting in a natural wooded area, such as a forest or jungle. You have weakness to cold iron equal to half your level.
